name: GLKEffectPropertyMaterial
desc: Surface appearance properties for use in GLKit rendering effects.

items.name: var ambientColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The ambient color of the material.

items.name: var diffuseColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The diffuse color of the material.

items.name: var emissiveColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The emissive color of the material.

items.name: var shininess: GLfloat
items.desc: The shininess of the material, used when calculating specular lighting effects.

items.name: var specularColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The specular color of the material.
